Patents

Include patents
Include non-patent literature
Search within

Search within the title, abstract, claims, or full patent document: You can restrict your search to a specific field using field names.

Use TI= to search in the title, AB= for the abstract, CL= for the claims, or TAC= for all three. For example, TI=(safety belt).

Search by Cooperative Patent Classifications (CPCs): These are commonly used to represent ideas in place of keywords, and can also be entered in a search term box. If you're searching forseat belts, you could also search for B60R22/00 to retrieve documents that mention safety belts or body harnesses. CPC=B60R22 will match documents with exactly this CPC, CPC=B60R22/low matches documents with this CPC or a child classification of this CPC.

Learn More
Title Abstract Claims Full Document
Find patents

Keywords and boolean syntax (USPTO or EPO format): seat belt searches these two words, or their plurals and close synonyms. "seat belt" searches this exact phrase, in order. -seat -belt searches for documents not containing either word.

For searches using boolean logic, the default operator is AND with left associativity. Note: this means safety OR seat belt is searched as (safety OR seat) AND belt. Each word automatically includes plurals and close synonyms. Adjacent words that are implicitly ANDed together, such as (safety belt), are treated as a phrase when generating synonyms.

Learn More
Search by

Chemistry searches match terms (trade names, IUPAC names, etc. extracted from the entire document, and processed from .MOL files.)

Substructure (use SSS=) and similarity (use ~) searches are limited to one per search at the top-level AND condition. Exact searches can be used multiple times throughout the search query.

Searching by SMILES or InChi key requires no special syntax. To search by SMARTS, use SMARTS=.

To search for multiple molecules, select "Batch" in the "Type" menu. Enter multiple molecules separated by whitespace or by comma.

Learn More
Patent numbers

Search specific patents by importing a CSV or list of patent publication or application numbers.

^^164 4 A7 B7 五、發明説明（1 本發明係關於具有抗眞菌活性的新穎索達林（s〇rdarjn )衍 生物，也關於其製備，含此等化合物的臀藥組合物，以及 其醫學上的用途，更特定地説，是其在預防或治療哺乳動 物’包括人，的由眞菌感染所引起的疾病的用途。 英國專利1，162,027號説明藉培養蛛網糞殼菌眞菌的nrrl 3196菌株製備成抗生素81^226‘6。8!^2266(後稱索達林）據報 告有抑制眞菌活性。同一研究組還於Helvetica Chimica Acta (INI)，g_，説明索達林降解成索達里新 (sordaricin)。已公佈的日本專利申請案J6 2040292A説明 佐菲馬林（zofimarin)抗生素的製備，據報告佐菲馬林也具 有抗眞菌活性。 索達林、索達里新及佐菲馬林可以下式（A)代表 (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁)^^ 164 4 A7 B7 5. Description of the invention (1 The present invention relates to a novel sodarin (s〇rdarjn) derivative with antimycobacterial activity, as well as its preparation, buttock composition containing these compounds, and Its medical use, more specifically, its use in the prevention or treatment of diseases caused by Candida infections in mammals, including humans. British Patent No. 1,162,027 describes the cultivation of Mycobacterium faecalis The nrrl 3196 strain was prepared as an antibiotic 81 ^ 226'6. 8! ^ 2266 (hereinafter called sodarin) was reported to have inhibitory activity against the mycobacterium. The same research group also explained sodarin in Helvetica Chimica Acta (INI), g It is degraded into sordaricin. Published Japanese patent application J6 2040292A shows the preparation of zofimarin antibiotics. It is reported that zofimarin also has antimycobacterial activity. Sodarin, Sodarin Lixin and Zofimarin can be represented by the following formula (A) (please read the notes on the back before filling this page)

Although sodarin and zofimaline exhibited antimycobacterial activity, these two compounds had only moderate activity, and the tests of various mycobacteria showed a limited range of action. The inventors are equal to the latter group of novel candidiasis sodarin derivatives. These derivatives have excellent anti-candidiasis activity and a wider range of action. Suitable organic salts include amine salts such as trialkylamines (such as triethylamine), dioxane Amines (such as dicyclohexylamine) 'optionally substituted fluorenylamines (such as phenylfluorenylamine or p-bromobenzylamine), procaine, ethanolamine, diethanolamine, N-methylglucamine And three paper standards for the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 specifications (210X297mm) A7 ^^ 1644 ______ Β7 5. Description of the invention (5) (methyl) methylamine salt, and amino acid salt ( (Such as lysine salt and spermine salt) 0 The compound of formula (I) referred to hereinafter includes this compound and its pharmaceutically acceptable salts. Pharmaceutically unacceptable salts can be used to prepare compounds of formula (I), which is another aspect of the present invention. Metabolically unstable compounds of formula (I) are compounds that are converted into compounds of formula (I) in vivo. Examples of such derivatives include metabolically unstable esters traditionally formed from free trait acids in the molecule. It is understood that 'this invention includes any individual isomers of the compound represented by formula (〗)' includes optical isomers and mixtures thereof, including all or part of racemic mixtures. The "alkyl" here refers to either the alkyl group itself or the alkyl portion of the C14 alkoxy group may be linear or branched. Suitable examples include methyl, ethyl, n-propyl, isopropyl , N-butyl, secondary butyl, tertiary butyl, n-hexyl, and n-octyl. The so-called "aryl" here, whether it is an aromatic body or part of a group, means phenyl or heteroaryl , Each optionally substituted by one or more (eg 1, 2 or 3) atoms or radicals selected from halogen, hydroxy, Cu alkyl, c] _6alkoxy 4Ci_4 alkoxycarbonyl. This heteroaryl The group may be a 5- or 6-membered heteroaryl ring containing one or more heteroatoms selected from nitrogen, oxygen, and sulfur. Examples of suitable heteroaryl groups include pyridyl, furyl, pyrenyl, and halo The term "halogen" means fluorine, gas, moth or moth. Invention description (11) [lR- (la, 3a ^ Αβ, 4a /?, 7/9, 7a ^, 8a / 5)] 8 a-[[1 S , 4 S, 6 R, 8 R] -2,7-dioxo-4,6-dimethyl-cis-bicyclo [3.4.0] -non-7-yl-oxy · methyl] -4 -Methyl-4,4a, 5,6,7,7a, 8,8a -octahydro-7-methyl-3- (1-methylethyl) -l, 4-methylene-s- Indah-3a (lH) -tetioic acid; [1R- (1 a, 3a Lu, 4a / 5, 7 / ?, 7aa, 8a cold)] 8a-[(2,3-anhydro-6-de Oxygen-4-O-propyl-cold-D-piperanmannosyloxy) methyl] _4_carboxamide-4,4a, 5,6,7,7a, 8,8a-octahydro-7 -Methyl- 3- (1-methylethyl) -1,4-methylene-sM-da-3a (lH) -carboxylic acid; [1R- (1 a, 3a / ?, 4々, 4a Lu, 7 Lu, 7aa, 8ay5)] 8a-[(2,3-anhydro-6-deoxy-4-0-methyl · Van-D-piperanmannosyloxy) methyl] -4 _Methyl-4,43,5,6,7,7 &amp;, 8,8 &amp; -octahydro-7-methyl-3- (1-methylethyl) -1,4-methylene- s-indap-3a (lH) -carboxylic acid; and its pharmaceutically acceptable salts and solvates (such as hydrates) or metabolic instability derivatives. The compound of formula (I) is a very effective fungicide for the treatment of animal infections including humans. For example, it can be used to treat various types of Candida (such as Candida albicans, Candida group (Pseudomonas glabrata), Candida tropicalis, Candida parapsilosis, and Candida pseudotropicalis), Cryptococcus neoformans, and Pneumocystis carinii Insects, various Aspergillus species (such as Aspergillus flavus and Aspergillus fumigatus), Coccidioides (such as Coccidioides), Paracoccidioides (such as Paracoccus brazii), and Histoplasma (such as capsules) Systemic infections caused by histoplasma) or genus Buds (such as dermatitis dermatitis). It can also be used to treat local infections caused by a variety of Candida, Trichoderma, Microsporum or Epidermophilia (such as Trichomonas esculenta, Crimson red bacteria, Microsporum canis or Trichophyton floccus), or caused by Mucosal infection caused by Candida albicans. ___ -14- This paper uses the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 ^ (210X297mm) (Please read the precautions on the back before filling this page)

A7 B7 經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印製 五、發明説明（12) 式（I)化合物也可用於治療由各種絲狀眞菌如地絲菌屬（如 Geotrichum clavatum)，絲孢酵母屬（如白吉利氏絲孢酵母） ，Blastoschizomyces(如 Blast〇schizomyCes capitatus)，孢 子絲菌屬（如申克氏孢子絲菌）’ Scedosporium(如 Scedosporium apiosperum)，枝孢屬（如腐肉枝孢）及卵瓶形 酵母所引起的感染。 式（I)化合物也可用於治療由原蟲如弓形體， Cryptoperidum，利什曼原蟲，Tripanos〇rna，賈第亞蟲’ 毛滴蟲所引起的感染。 本發明化合物抗眞菌活性的活體外評估係於液體或固體 培養基上以抗眞菌二倍系列稀釋技術完成，此技術係測定 抗眞菌劑抑制於37°C培氧24至48小時後的眞菌的生長的最 低抑制濃度（MIC)。實行時，以含抗眞菌劑二倍稀釋液的 一系列瓊脂碟或肉湯微稀釋系列培植與臨床有關的病原， 如白色念球菌。然後測定瓊脂碟或肉湯微稀釋系列内眞菌 的生長並記錄恰當的MI C値。 將由無藥物的對照凹内的〇.〇 1及〇. 1微升肉湯作次培養測 定MF C値（即殺死至少原始液體培養基内99 9 %病原菌的最 低抗眞菌濃度），第一凹内有病原菌生長，其他壤脂碟凹無 病原菌生長。 式（I)化合物的活體内評估係以給予（如皮下給予，經口给 予’腹腔内给予或靜脈内給予）接種有白色念球菌株的屬一 系列不同劑量測定。未經治療的鼠於3至9天内死亡，記錄 能使5 0 %受感染的鼠不死亡的劑量。 -15- 尽紙張尺度遑用中國國家標率（CNS )八4规格（21〇x297公釐） (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁} .乂. 、1T. Description of the invention (12) The compound of formula (I) can also be used for the treatment of various filamentous mycetes such as Geotrichum clavatum, Mycelia ( Such as B. gerbilii), Blastoschizomyces (such as BlastozochimyCes capitatus), spore mycelia (such as S. sclerotiorum) Scedosporium (such as Scedosporium apiosperum), Cladosporium (such as Scavenger spores) Infections caused by bottle-shaped yeast. The compound of formula (I) can also be used to treat infections caused by protozoa such as Toxoplasma gondii, Cryptoperidum, Leishmania, Tripanosna, Giardia trichomoniasis. The in vitro evaluation of the anti-smear activity of the compounds of the present invention is performed on liquid or solid media using a two-fold serial dilution technique of anti-smear bacteria. This technique measures the inhibition of anti-smear agents at 37 ° C after 24 to 48 hours The minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) of the growth of Candida. In practice, clinically relevant pathogens, such as Candida albicans, are cultivated with a series of agar plates or broth microdilution series containing a double dilution of antimycobacterial agent. Then measure the growth of the candida in the agar dish or broth microdilution series and record the appropriate MI C value. The MF C value (that is, the minimum concentration of anti-mycobacteria that kills at least 99.9% of pathogens in the original liquid medium) will be determined by subculture of 0.01 and 0.1 microliter broth in the control cavity without drug. Pathogens grow in the recesses, and other soil fat dish recesses grow without pathogens. The in vivo evaluation of the compound of formula (I) is based on a series of different dosimetry in which administration (eg, subcutaneous administration, oral administration, intraperitoneal administration or intravenous administration) is inoculated with Candida albicans strains. Untreated mice died within 3 to 9 days, and the dose that prevented 50% of infected mice from dying was recorded. -15- Use the Chinese National Standard Rate (CNS) 84 specifications (21〇x297mm) (please read the precautions on the back before filling out this page). 乂. 、 1T. A7

經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印製 由於式（i)化合物具抗眞菌活性，可用於治療人及動物的 各種眞菌感染。此類感染包括表面的，皮的，皮下的及系 統的霉菌感染，如呼吸道感染，胃腸道感染，心血管感染 ，尿道感染，中樞神經系統（CNS)感染，念珠菌病及慢性 枯液念珠菌病（如鵝口瘡及陰道念珠菌病）及由眞菌引起的 皮膚感染，皮及粘膜念珠菌病，包括癖及白癖感染在内的 膚眞菌病，香港腳，甲溝炎，花斑癬，紅癖，擦爛，眞菌 性泡瘆’念珠菌外陰炎及外耳炎。也可用作預防劑以預防 系統性及局部性眞菌感染。用作預防劑時，可作爲選擇性 腸去污染計劃的一部分以預防發生於免疫減弱病人的感染（ 例如愛滋病病人，接受化學治療的癌症病人，及器官移植 病人）。於某些疾病或醫原性情況下可能也需在抗生素治療 期預防眞菌的過度生長。 用於治療時’本發明化合物可以其原料藥給予，但較佳 是使用其醫藥調配物。是以本發明還提供醫藥調配物，含 有式（I)化合物及其醫藥上可接受的鹽，以及一或多種醫藥 上可接受的載劑，並且視需要含有其他治療及/或預防成 分。”可接受的” 一詞意爲與其他成分相容的並對接受者無 害的。 本發明組合物包括特別調配成用於經口給予、經頰給予 、注射給予、植入給予、直腸給予、局部給予、經眼或泌 尿生殖系統給予的形式的組合物，或適於吸入或吹入給予 形式的組合物。 供經口給予的錠或膠囊可含傳統的賦形劑，如結合劑， ________；_ -16- 本紙張尺度適用中國國家標準（CNS ) A4規格（210X297公釐） ' (請先閱讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) •'户. 、11 經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印裝Printed by the Employee Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Standards of the Ministry of Economic Affairs. The compound of formula (i) has antimycobacterial activity and can be used to treat various infections of human mycetes. Such infections include surface, skin, subcutaneous, and systemic fungal infections, such as respiratory infections, gastrointestinal infections, cardiovascular infections, urinary tract infections, central nervous system (CNS) infections, candidiasis, and candidal candidiasis Diseases (such as thrush and vaginal candidiasis) and skin infections caused by candidiasis, candidiasis of the skin and mucous membranes, skin candidiasis including addiction and white addiction infections, Hong Kong foot, paronychia, variegation Ringworm, red addiction, abrasion, mycobacterial alveolar'candidiasis vulvitis and otitis externa. It can also be used as a preventive agent to prevent systemic and local infections. When used as a preventative, it can be used as part of a selective bowel decontamination program to prevent infections that occur in immunocompromised patients (eg, AIDS patients, cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy, and organ transplant patients). In some diseases or iatrogenic conditions, it may be necessary to prevent the overgrowth of mycetes during antibiotic treatment. When used for treatment, the compound of the present invention can be administered as its raw material, but it is preferred to use its pharmaceutical formulation. Therefore, the present invention also provides pharmaceutical formulations containing the compound of formula (I) and pharmaceutically acceptable salts thereof, and one or more pharmaceutically acceptable carriers, and optionally containing other therapeutic and / or prophylactic ingredients. The term "acceptable" means compatible with other ingredients and not harmful to the recipient. The composition of the present invention includes a composition specially formulated for oral administration, buccal administration, injection administration, implantation administration, rectal administration, topical administration, administration via the eye or urogenital system, or suitable for inhalation or insufflation Into the composition in the form of administration. Description of the invention (14) For example, (iv) gum arabic, gelatin, sorbitol, tragacanth, starch syrup or polyvinylpyrrolidone; fillers such as lactose, sugar, microcrystalline cellulose Cornmeal powder 'saccharin' or sorbitol; lubricants such as magnesium stearate, stearic acid, talc, polyethylene glycol or silicon dioxide; crashing agents such as potato starch or sodium starch glycolate, Or crostscarmdlose sodium; or a moisturizing agent, such as sodium lauryl sulfate. Lozenges, including chewable, dispersible or foamed lozenges, can be coated by methods known in the art. Liquid preparations for oral administration may be, for example, aqueous or oily suspensions, solutions, emulsions, syrups or elixirs, or they may be dry products formulated with water or other carriers before use. Such liquid preparations may contain traditional additives such as suspending agents, such as sorbitol syrup, methyl cellulose, glucose / syrup, gelatin, hydroxyethyl cellulose, carboxymethyl cellulose, aluminum stearate gel Or hydrogenated edible fats; emulsifiers such as lecithin, sorbitan monooleate or gum arabic; non-aqueous carriers (which may include edible oils), such as almond oil, fractionated coconut oil, oily Ester, propylene glycol or ethanol, and preservatives, such as methyl or propyl P-hydroxybenzoate or ascorbic acid. For buccal administration, the composition can be tablets or tongues made in the traditional way. The composition of the present invention can be formulated for administration by injection or continuous infusion. The formulations for injection can be prepared in unit dose form in ampoules or in a multi-dose container with preservatives. These compositions may be suspensions, solutions, or emulsions in oily or aqueous vehicles, and may contain formulating agents such as suspending agents, stabilizers, and / or dispersing agents. Alternatively, the active ingredient can be powdered and mixed with a suitable carrier before use, such as sterilized pyrogen-free water. -17- Use Chinese nursery standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297mm) --------- f '乂 ------, ιτ ------ ^ (please read the back first (Notes to fill out this page) A7 ^^^ —______ B7___ V. Description of the invention (15) When the composition of the present invention is administered by inhalation, it is filled with a propellant in a pressurized tank with a spray, such as two gas two Fluoromethane, trifluorofluoromethane, difluorotetrafluoroethane, carbon dioxide or other suitable gases are delivered or delivered by spray. In the case of pressurized spraying, the dosage unit can deliver a fixed dose through the valve. Alternatively, when the composition of the present invention is administered by inhalation, it may be in the form of a dry powder composition, for example, a mixture of the compound of the present invention and a suitable powder base, such as lactose or starch, or it may be a separate physical form modified drug. The powder composition can be prepared in a unit dosage form, such as a capsule or a gelatin cartridge, or a blister pack, which is administered with the aid of an inhaler or an insufflator. The composition can be prepared in the form of suppositories, for example, containing traditional suppository bases, or suppositories, containing, for example, traditional suppository bases. Printed by the Employee Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Standards of the Ministry of Economic Affairs (please read the precautions on the back before filling in this page) This composition can be formulated into ointments, creams, gels, lotions, shampoos, powders (including spray powders) , Suppositories, tamponades, sprays, sprays, sprays, drops (such as eye, ear or nasal drops, or coatings (P〇ur_〇ns)) for topical administration. Ointments for the administration of eye clear are available Sterilized ingredients are prepared by sterilization. The coating can be made into an oil body for veterinary use, which contains organic solvents, and if necessary, use formulating agents such as stabilizers and co-solvents. Suppositories and suppositories for vaginal insertion can use traditional techniques Formulated, when appropriate, may contain a foaming carrier. Where appropriate, such compositions may also contain other active ingredients such as corticosteroids, antibiotics' or antiparasitic agents. Liquid preparations for intranasal delivery may be prepared as solutions or suspensions Liquid form, and may contain traditional excipients such as tonicity modifiers, such as vaporized sodium, glucose, or mannose; preservatives, such as vaporized benzalkonium chloride, ethylmercury sodium thiosalicylate. Ethyl alcohol; and others Ingredients such as suspending agent, buffering agent, and stability -18- This paper standard uses the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297 mm). The A7 B7 is printed by the Employee Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Standards of the Ministry of Economy. V. Invention Instructions (16) Agents, dispersants and / or flavoring agents. Transdermal administration can be achieved by designing a suitable system to promote the absorption of active ingredients through the skin, and is generally composed of a formulation base, which is sealed in a plaster cloth that can be attached to the skin. The plaster cloth includes a backing film and a release liner. This system may contain absorption enhancers, such as alcohol, or enhance ion absorption by promoting ion electrophoresis. The composition of the present invention can also be formulated with long-acting formulations. Such long-acting formulations can be borrowed Implantation (for example, subcutaneous implantation or intramuscular implantation), or by intramuscular injection. Therefore, for example, the compound of the present invention can use suitable polymers or hydrophobic materials (such as acceptable emulsion in oil) or ions Exchange resin formulation, or make poorly soluble derivatives, such as poorly soluble salts. When the composition is made into dosage units, as the compound of the present invention is administered orally, One unit preferably contains from 0.001 mg to 1000 mg, more preferably from 0.01 to 400 mg of active ingredient. If it is used for the treatment of adults, the daily dose should be 0.001 mg to 5000 mg, most preferably 0.001 Mg to 2000 mg, this dose can be divided into 1 to 4 administrations, depending on the route of administration and the condition of the patient and the disease to be treated. This compound can be given by intravenous infusion at a dose of, for example, 50 mg / Kg / day of active ingredient. The treatment period depends on the reaction rate rather than any specified number of days. The compound of the present invention can also be used in combination with other therapeutic agents, so that the present invention provides the compound of the present invention and other therapeutic active agents in another aspect The compound 0 is based on the compound of the present invention and can be combined with one or more anti-mycobacterial agents, such as polienics derivatives (Amphotericin B (Amphotericin B), Nystatin _ -19- This paper scale is applicable to the Chinese National Standard (CNS ) Α4 specification (210Χ297mm) (Please read the precautions on the back before filling out this education) ί Τ 321644 A7 B7 5. Description of the invention (17) (Nystatin) (lipotrope of amphotericin B)), pyrrole derivative( Fluconazole, Intraconazole, Ketoconazole, Miconazole, Clotrimazole ZD-08070 (UK-109496)), 5-Fluoridine Glycosides, Pneumocandine or Echinocandine derivatives such as cilofungin, LY-303366, L-733560 and / or one or more immunomodulators such as interferon (IFN-r ), Interleukin (1L-1, 1L-2, 1L-3 and 1L-8) and colony growth factor, [(G) -CSF, (M) -CSF and (GM) -CSF] and defensin ( defensines) combined use. Compounds particularly suitable for use with the compounds of the present invention include Intraconazole, Fluoride: Y :, Fluconazole, or Amphoterican B. When the compound of the present invention is administered in combination with another antimycobacterial agent, the compound of the present invention and another antimycobacterial agent may be administered at the maximum recommended dose or at a lower dose. The above-mentioned compound medicine can be used in the form of a pharmaceutical preparation, and the pharmaceutical preparation containing the above-mentioned compound drug and an acceptable carrier constitutes another aspect of the present invention. The components of these compound drugs can be administered sequentially or simultaneously with compound drug formulations. When the compound of the present invention and the second therapeutic agent are co-administered to treat the same disease, the dose of each compound may be different from that when the compound is used alone. Those skilled in this art will easily know the appropriate dosage. According to m of the present invention, the inventors provide a compound of formula (1) or a physiologically acceptable salt thereof or a pharmaceutical composition containing the compound of formula (1) or a physiologically acceptable salt thereof for treatment, in particular It is used to treat animals (especially humans) (please read the precautions on the back and then fill out this page)

321644 五、發明説明（18) 的眞菌感染。 根據本發明的另一方面，發明人等提供式（1)化合物或其 生理上可接受的鹽的用途，用以製造治療人或人之外的動 物的眞菌感染的藥物。 根據本發明的另一方面，發明人等提供治療人或人之外 的動物的身體的方法以克服眞菌疾病，此法包括给予該身 體治療有效量的式（I)化合物或其生理上可接受的鹽。 精於此技藝者會了解到，此處所指的治療包括預防以及 治療已形成的疾病或感染。 。 本發明化合物可以下述方法製備。 犁備Ζ爲（a)基困的式（I)化合物的通法（Α)包括以式 化合物321644 Fifth, the invention description (18) of Mycobacterium infection. The completion of cyclization is: in the presence of a hydroxyl protecting group, first remove the cold protecting group, and then borrow, for example, to form S-alkyl dithiocarbonate (such as 8_ methyl dithiocarbonate) Activate the free hydroxyl group, and then close the ring under root conditions, for example, in a hydrocarbon solvent (such as toluene) under reflux with a hydrogen donor, such as a hydride reducing agent (such as trialkyltin hydride, such as tributyltin hydride ) Treat the activated intermediate solution in an activator (such as azobis (isobutyronitrile)), and then remove the carboxyl protecting group. (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) A7五、發明説明（28) 經濟部中央揉準局貝工消費合作社印製 、另一通法（E)中，式（1)化合物，其中R1是醯氧基及/ 或R4是CH2〇C〇R8，可藉酸化經保護的式⑴衍生物製備 其中R是經基及/或尺4是CH2〇H及任何不安定的基團 是經保遵的’然後再除去存在的經保護的基困。酿化反應 可用傳統方法進行，例如用羧酸在有活化劑，如二環己基 碳化一亞胺，及合適的鹼，如二甲胺基吡啶，之存在下處 理，並視需要在有合適的鹼，如吡啶或4-二甲胺基吡啶之 存在下處理。 根據另一通法（E)，式（I)化合物，其中R1是平展構形的 羥基，可由經保護的式（1)衍化物製備，其中Rl是軸構形的 羥基而任何不安定的基图（如羧基，羥基及CH〇基團）是經 保遵的，然後再除去存在的經保護的基團。此異構化反應 可方便地以二步驟進行：（i)用合適的氧化系統[例如氧化 鉻，在有吡啶存在下，於含有醋酸酐的_素化烴屬溶劑（例 如二氣甲烷）内]將2，-軸向〇H氧化成氧基，（ii)使用如硼氫 化物（例如硼氫化鈉）的合適的還原劑將氧基還原成〇H基團 。此還原可方便地於如醇之溶劑（例如甲醇水溶液）於〇。至 1 0 C進行。 於另一通法（E)中’式（I)化合物，其中R1是鹵素原予， 可由R1爲羥基的保護過的式（I)衍化物製備，然後再除去任 何存在的保護基。此取代反應係以轉化構形完成。是以， 例如，軸向OH基可藉加碘於起始物質於合適的如烴屬的溶 劑（例如甲苯）内的溶液中在有三苯基膦及碘的存在下並加 熱（例如在回流下）此混合物，轉化成平展的碘原子。 _ -31 - 本紙張尺度適用中國囷家標準（CNS ) A4規格（210X297公f ------— (請先閲讀背面之注§項再填寫本頁) 乂(Please read the precautions on the back before filling in this page) A7 V. Description of Invention (28) Printed by the Ministry of Economic Affairs Central Bureau of Customs and Industry Beigong Consumer Cooperative, another general method (E), the compound of formula (1), where R1 Is an oxy group and / or R4 is CH2〇C〇R8, can be prepared by acidifying a protected derivative of formula (1) where R is a group and / or 4 is CH2〇H and any unstable group is protected Obey 'and then remove the existing protected foundation. The brewing reaction can be carried out by traditional methods, for example, using carboxylic acid in the presence of an activator, such as dicyclohexylcarbodiimide, and a suitable base, such as dimethylaminopyridine, and if necessary, a suitable Treated in the presence of a base such as pyridine or 4-dimethylaminopyridine. According to another general method (E), a compound of formula (I), wherein R1 is a hydroxyl group in a flat configuration, can be prepared from a protected derivative of formula (1), wherein Rl is a hydroxyl group in an axial configuration and any unstable base map (Such as carboxyl, hydroxyl and CH〇 groups) are subject to compliance, and then remove the existing protected groups. This isomerization reaction can be conveniently carried out in two steps: (i) using a suitable oxidation system [such as chromium oxide, in the presence of pyridine, in a solvent containing acetic anhydride, such as dioxo methane, (such as methane) ] Oxidation of 2, -axial OH to oxy groups, (ii) Reduction of oxy groups to OH groups using a suitable reducing agent such as borohydride (eg sodium borohydride). This reduction can be conveniently carried out in a solvent such as alcohol (e.g. aqueous methanol solution). To 1 0 C. In another general method (E), the compound of formula (I), wherein R1 is a halogen atom, can be prepared from a protected derivative of formula (I) in which R1 is a hydroxy group, and then any protective groups present are removed. This substitution reaction is completed in a transformed configuration. Therefore, for example, the axial OH group can be added to the solution of the starting material in a suitable solvent such as hydrocarbons (eg toluene) in the presence of triphenylphosphine and iodine and heated (eg under reflux) ) This mixture is converted into flat iodine atoms. _ -31-This paper scale is applicable to the Chinese Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297 public f ------— (please read the note § item on the back and fill in this page) 乂

經濟部中央揉準局員工消費合作社印製 以合適的氟化劑（例如三氟化二乙胺基硫（DAST)在合適 的如南素化烴屬的溶劑（例如二氣甲烷）内或芳香族烴屬（例 如甲苯）内於室溫反應可引入氟。 於另一通法（E)中，式（1)化合物，其中γ是氧，n是零， R及R2是氫，而X是CH，或其經保護的衍化物，可藉用 氫及合適的催化劑（如鈀/碳）在合適的溶劑内還原’再除 去羧基保護基製備。 於另一通法（E)中，式（1)化合物，其中γ是氧，η是零 ，R2及R3是氫，而X是C = CH2，可用四氧化餓及高碘酸鈉 行氧化轉化成對應的又爲(：=〇的化合物。 同樣，式（I)化合物，其中γ是氧，n是零，尺2及尺3是氫 ’而X是C = CH2 ’用三氧化鉻在吡啶内氧化，可轉化成式 (I)化合物，其中R2及R3與其相聯的碳原子代表€ = 〇。 根據方法（E)的另一具體實施例，r 1 5爲羥基的式（j)化合 物之叛基經保護的衍化物可藉標準的取代反應，再除去羧 基保護基，轉化成R1S爲南素的式（1)化合物。是以，以氟 原子取代羥基可藉加三氟化二乙胺基硫（DAST)於起始物質 在合適的如由素化烴屬的溶劑（例如二氣甲烷）内的溶液中 行構形轉化完成。此反應可方便地於室溫進行。 於另一（E)法具體實施例中，式（1)化合物，其中Ri5是 Cu虎氧基或視需要取代的烷氧基及/或尺”是^#烷氧 基甲基，可用經保護的式化合物衍生物，其中Rl5及/ 或R1 7含游離態羥基，而任何不安定的基困（例如羧基及羥 基）已作了合適的保護，行烷基化製備，然後再除去存在的 _ _ 32 - 本紙張尺度逍用中國國家揉準（CNS )八4胁（210X297公釐) ' 一 (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁)Printed by the Consumer Cooperative of the Central Ministry of Economic Affairs of the Ministry of Economic Affairs with a suitable fluorinating agent (such as diethylaminosulfur trifluoride (DAST) in a suitable solvent such as a southern hydrocarbon (such as methane) or aromatic Fluorine can be introduced in a hydrocarbon group (such as toluene) at room temperature. In another general method (E), the compound of formula (1) where γ is oxygen, n is zero, R and R2 are hydrogen, and X is CH , Or its protected derivatives, can be prepared using hydrogen and a suitable catalyst (such as palladium / carbon) reduction in a suitable solvent and then removing the carboxyl protecting group. In another general method (E), formula (1) Compounds, where γ is oxygen, η is zero, R2 and R3 are hydrogen, and X is C = CH2, can be converted to the corresponding compound (: = 〇) by oxidation of sodium tetraoxide and sodium periodate. Therefore, by replacing the hydroxyl group with a fluorine atom, a trifluorodiethylamino group can be added Sulfur (DAST) is converted into a configuration in a solution of the starting material in a suitable solvent such as a chlorinated hydrocarbon (such as methane). This reaction can be conveniently carried out at room temperature. 、1T A7 A7 經濟部中央揉準局貝工消费合作社印製 B7 五、發明説明（30) 保護基。烷基化可方便地以強鹼金屬瞼（例如氫化鈉）作初 步反應，再以烷基南化物（例如曱基溴）反應進行。此反應 可在如醚（例如四氫呋喃）之溶劑内於約〇 °至5 0 °C溫度完成 。適宜時也可有如由素化四燒基録(例如琪化四丁基銨）之 存在。 或者，直鏈或支鏈的烷基可方便地以二步驟引入：第一 步驟包括使用合適的烯基_素化物在有如碳酸鹽（例如碳酸 铯）之鹼的存在下於約0°至50°C溫度行烷基化；第二步驟 包括在有把催化劑（例如1 0 %把/破）於約室溫行氫化。 於另一（E)法具體實施例中，式（I)化合物，其中R15是 CH2OCOR20或R1是OCOR18，可藉醯化經保護的式（1)化 合物的衍生物，其中R17是CH2OH或R15是羥基，而任何 不安定的基團（例如羧基及羥基）已作了保護，然後再除去 存在的保護基，製備。醯化反應可用傳統方法進行，例如 用羧酸在有如二環己基碳化亞胺之活化劑及合適的鹼（如二 甲胺基吡啶）之存在下進行，或使用醯基南素（醯基氣），視 需要在有合適的鹼（如二甲胺基吡啶）之存在下進行。 根據方法（E)的另一具體實施例，crUr!6代表(：=0的 式（I)化合物可藉氧化經保護的式（1)化合物衍生物，其中 R15是幾基’而任何不安定的基團（例如羧基及羥基）已作了 保濩，然後再除去存在的保護基，製備。氧化反應可方便 地以加如二甲基亞颯之氧化劑在有三氟醋酸酐之存在下進 行。氧化可於在有合適的溶劑如卣素化烴屬（如二氣曱烷） 内於高溫（例如約4 〇。至8 0 °C )進行。 (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) X. &lt;11 -33 B7 五、發明説明（31) 式（I)化合物，其中CR15R16代表ch = CH2基，可以對應 的CR15R、c = 〇的式⑴化合物或其經保護的衍生物與南 素化烷基-三苯基鳞及烷基鋰於非質子溶劑（如四氫呋喃）内 反應製備。 R15爲疊氮基圏的式（I)化合物可用R15爲羥基的對應的 式（I)化合物或其經保護的衍生物與甲苯磺醯南素反應，然 後以疊氮化鹼金屬（例如疊氮化鋰）在非質子溶劑（如二氣甲 燒）内處理所得甲苯磺酸酯衍生物製備。 上述許多方法都需在最後步驟除取一或多個保護基以製 得所需式（I)化合物。是以另一通法（F )包括使經保護的式 (I)化合物衍生物去保護。此處所用的合適的羧基保護基及 經基保護基包括任何傳統的保護基，例如於,,pr〇tective Groups in Organic Chemistry&quot;, Ed. J. F. W. McOmie (Plenum Press, 1973 )或&quot;Protective Groups in Organic， 1T A7 A7 Printed by Beigong Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Economic Development of the Ministry of Economic Affairs B7 V. Description of invention (30) Protection base. The alkylation can be conveniently carried out with a strong alkali metal eyelid (such as sodium hydride) as the initial reaction, and then with an alkylnanate compound (such as methyl bromide). This reaction can be completed in a solvent such as ether (eg, tetrahydrofuran) at a temperature of about 0 ° to 50 ° C. Where appropriate, there may also be the presence of a basic compound such as tetrabutylammonium (eg, tetrabutylammonium). Alternatively, straight-chain or branched-chain alkyl groups can be conveniently introduced in two steps: the first step involves the use of a suitable alkenyl compound in the presence of a base such as a carbonate (eg cesium carbonate) at about 0 ° to 50 The alkylation is carried out at a temperature of ° C; the second step involves hydrogenation of the catalyst (for example, 10% / cracked) at about room temperature. In another specific embodiment of the method (E), the compound of formula (I), wherein R15 is CH2OCOR20 or R1 is OCOR18, a derivative of the protected compound of formula (1) can be synthesized, wherein R17 is CH2OH or R15 is Hydroxyl group, and any unstable group (such as carboxyl group and hydroxyl group) has been protected, and then remove the existing protecting group to prepare. The acylation reaction can be carried out by conventional methods, for example, using carboxylic acid in the presence of an activator such as dicyclohexylcarbodiimide and a suitable base (such as dimethylaminopyridine), or using acetynannan (acidyl gas) ), If necessary, in the presence of a suitable base (such as dimethylaminopyridine). According to another specific embodiment of method (E), crUr! 6 represents (: = 0 the compound of formula (I) can be oxidized by the protected compound of formula (1) derivative, where R15 is a few groups' and any unstable The groups (such as carboxyl and hydroxy) have been preserved, and then the existing protecting groups are removed to prepare. The oxidation reaction can be conveniently carried out in the presence of trifluoroacetic anhydride by adding an oxidizing agent such as dimethyl sulfa. Oxidation can be carried out in a suitable solvent such as halogenated hydrocarbons (such as dimethane) at high temperature (for example, about 40. to 80 ° C). Examples of suitable carboxy-protecting groups include arylalkyl groups such as diphenylmethyl'P-methoxybenzyl and silyl groups (e.g. trimethylsilyl or secondary butylmethylsilyl groups). Examples of suitable hydroxy protecting groups include arylalkyl 'such as P-methoxybenzyl and ester groups such as benzyloxycarbonyl. The aldehyde group can be protected in the form of a cyclic ketal. The protecting group can be removed by conventional techniques. Therefore, diphenylmethyl can be removed with trifluoroacetic acid 'or hydrodecomposed in the presence of a palladium catalyst (e.g. 0% palladium / carbon). 印 製 321644 五、發明説明（35 基困。是以，經合適保護的4，_脱甲基索達林衍生物或 R爲羥基的式（Π)化合物，可用傳統方法反應使4，-羥基 轉化成所需的R1基團。是以，例如，轉化成…^烷氧基烷 基或芳基^—4燒氧基可以傳統烷基化方法完成，例如，根 據前述各法完成。除去羥基製成尺！5爲氫的化合物，可方 便地以二步驟完成：（i)用強鹼（例如氫化鈉）在有咪唑的存 To 丨 20 c) Treated with a hydride reducing agent (such as trialkyltin hydride, such as tributyltin hydride), if necessary, remove this group in the presence of an activator [such as azobis (isobutyl quinidine)] group. Conversion to C2_6 alkyl can generate (i) the aforementioned 8-alkyl dithiocarbonate, (ii) react with a trialkylalkenyl tin compound under the aforementioned conditions to replace this group with a silyl group to remove S- The alkyl dithiocarbonate group, and (iii) reduce this alkenyl group to an alkyl group in the presence of a suitable palladium catalyst (eg, i 0% palladium / carbon). The base salt of the compound of formula (I) can be produced by treating the compound of formula (1) with a suitable salt or base. Therefore, for example, the compound of formula (I) may be selected from sodium hydroxide or sodium hydroxide, bicarbonate, carbonate or acetate (such as potassium hydroxide, hydrogen carbonate, sodium bicarbonate, or potassium acetate), acetic acid Salt or test preparation of ammonium, calcium acetate and L·lysine. This salt can be added, for example, to a solution or suspension of a compound of formula (I) in a suitable solvent such as alcohol (eg methanol) or dioxane by adding a suitable salt or base (aqueous solution if necessary) ° C to 8 0 ° C, preferably, about room-38- The paper size is free to use the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297mm)

X 訂 A7 經濟部中央揉準局員工消费合作社印裝 五、發明説明（36) 、溫’製備。 醫藥上可接受的鹽也可由其他鹽，包括式（1)化合物的其 他醫藥上可接受的鹽，用傳統方法製備。 式（I)化合物的代謝上不安定的酯可以傳統方法與存在的 幾基反應製備。同樣，代謝上不安定的酯也可與分子上存 在的游離態的叛基生成。 新穎式（XII)化合物可根據後述發酵方法製備，或用生物 轉化方法使索達林去甲基化製備。 發酵方法包括培養能產生式（XII)化合物的微生物，然後 再由培養物中分離式（XII)化合物。 能產生式（XII)化合物的微生物可以是蛛網糞殼菌的變種 菌株’此種菌株可藉分析以標準方法由微生物發酵取得的 試驗樣品篩選謗變種的存活率獲得證實。特別是，方便使 用的微生物是由英國CAB International Mycological Institute, Genetic Resource Reference Collection Bakeham Lane, Egham，Surrey TW20 9TY不變培養集合所存的蛛網糞 殼菌的變種菌株。此菌株係於1994年6月10曰由此機構收 到，給予的取得編號爲IMI 362184，並註明收到曰期及存 活證實日期分別爲1994年6月13日及21曰。此機構依布達 佩斯條約被承a忍爲國際存儲（Internati〇nai Depository)權威 。就IMI 362 184到目前爲止所證實的特性見實例7 4所述。 本發明在又一方面提供原IMI 362184微生物及其變種。 IMI 3 62184變種可自然發生，也可以各種方法，包括HI Adler 於 Radiation and Radioisotops for Industrial -39 匕紙張尺度適用中國國家揲準（CNS ) A4规格（210X297公羞） (請先閱讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁)X Order A7 Printed by the Employees' Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Economic Development of the Ministry of Economic Affairs V. Description of invention (36), prepared by Wen ’. Pharmaceutically acceptable salts can also be prepared from other salts, including other pharmaceutically acceptable salts of compounds of formula (1), using conventional methods. Metabolically unstable esters of compounds of formula (I) can be prepared by reaction with the existing bases by conventional methods. Similarly, metabolically unstable esters can also be formed with free radicals present on the molecule. The novel compound of formula (XII) can be prepared according to the fermentation method described later, or can be prepared by demethylation of sodarin by a biotransformation method. The fermentation method involves culturing a microorganism capable of producing the compound of formula (XII), and then separating the compound of formula (XII) from the culture. The microorganism capable of producing the compound of formula (XII) may be a variant of D. arachnoides. This strain can be confirmed by analyzing the survival rate of the mutant by screening test samples obtained by fermentation of microorganisms by standard methods. In particular, the microorganisms that are convenient to use are the strains of arachnid coccidioides stored in the constant culture collection of CAB International Mycological Institute, Genetic Resource Reference Collection Bakeham Lane, Egham, Surrey TW20 9TY, United Kingdom. This strain was received by this organization on June 10, 1994, and the acquisition number was given as IMI 362184, and the date of receipt and the date of confirmation of survival were indicated on June 13, 1994 and 21, respectively. This institution is accepted as an international depository (Internati〇nai Depository) authority under the Buda Pace Treaty. For the characteristics proven so far by IMI 362 184, see Example 74. In yet another aspect, the present invention provides the original IMI 362184 microorganism and variants thereof. The IMI 3 62184 variant can occur naturally or in a variety of ways, including HI Adler ’s Radiation and Radioisotops for Industrial -39. 、1T A7 B7 8^1644 五、發明説明（37)、 1T A7 B7 8 ^ 1644 V. Description of the invention (37)

Microorganisms'’ 内 Techniques for the Development of Microorganisms所述的方法，及Proceedings of theMicroorganisms ’’ Techniques for the Development of Microorganisms, and Proceedings of the

Symposium, Vienna 1973, p241, International Atomic Energy authority所述的方法。此等方法包括離子化放射， 化學方法，例如用N -甲基-N'-硝基-N -硝基異脈（n T G)， 熱’基因技術’如基因重組及基因轉化，處理，以及選擇 性的自然變種技術。 以發酵製備式（XII)化合物可以傳統方法完成，即在有可 同化的碳、氮、及礦物鹽源的存在下培養合適的微生物， 然後分離所需產物。 可同化的碳、氮、及礦物鹽源可由簡單的或複合的營養 劑供應。碳源一般包括葡萄糖，麥芽糖，澱粉，甘油，糖 密’糊精，乳糖，蔗糖，水果糖，半乳糖，肌醇，D_甘露 糖’大豆油’羧酸，胺基酸’甘油酯，醇，烷類及植物油 。碳源一般構成的發酵基的〇. 5至1 〇 %重量百分比。水果糖 ’葡萄糖及蔗糖代表較佳的碳源。 氮源一般包括大豆粉，玉米潰液，酒糟，酵母萃取物， 棉子粉，腺，磨碎的硬果粉，麥芽萃取物，糖密，酪蛋白 ’胺基酸混合物，氨（氣體或溶液），銨鹽或硝酸鹽，也可 用脲及其他醯胺。氮源一般構成的發酵基的〇1至1〇%重量 百分比。 可使用於培養基的營養礦物鹽包括一般使用的能產生鈉 、辞、按、鐵、巍、鋅、錄、姑、鞋、訊、路、約、銅、 紐、硼、磷酸鹽、硫酸鹽、氣化物及碳酸鹽離子的鹽。 -40- 本紙張尺度適用中國B家橾準（CNS ) A4規格（210X297公嫠 (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁} Λ. 訂 經濟部中央棣準局員工消費合作社印製 經濟部中央檫準局貝工消費合作社印製 A7 ---------- 五、發明説明（38) 一 *- 微生物的培養一般係於20。至40°C行之，較佳是2〇。(：至 35C ’尤其是約25。(：，有時需要在通風及振盪（如搖動或 攪拌）下進行。培養基内開始時可接種少量的菌絲體及/或 抱子°所得的植物性接種物可轉移至發酵基質，或者轉移 至一或多個種台（seed stages )，於該處進一步生長，然後再 轉移至主發酵基質。發酵一般在pH 3.5至9.5進行，較佳是 4·5至7.5。發酵基質内可能需加鹼或酸以維持pH在所需範 圍内。可加的合適的鹼包括氫氧化鹼金屬，例如氫氧化納 或氫氧化鉀水溶液。合適的酸包括礦物酸，如鹽酸，硫酸 或崎酸·。 發酵可進行4-30天，較佳是約5-15天。爲控制起泡過多 可加抗起泡劑，加入時距視需要而定。碳及/或氮源也可 視需要加於發酵基質内。 式（XII)化合物主要聯於細胞上，可加酸或可與水相溶的 有機溶劑，更佳是加鹼（例如氫氧化鈉），使成溶液。溶液 内的細胞可藉離心、傳統過濾法或膜過濾分離。此液體視 需要可再用酸，如硫酸，處理至p Η低於6 (例如約4.5 )。 式（XII)化合物可以各種分配技術分離並純化，例如用吸 附洗離，沉殿，分級:结晶，溶劑萃取，及液體-液體分配法 ，也可混合數種方法使用。 分離及純化式（IX)化合物以吸附於固體支撑上再做洗離 爲最合適。合適的固體支撑包括二氧化碎；非官能性大網 吸附樹脂，例如交聯的苯乙烯二乙烯基苯聚合物樹脂，如 CG161 及 Amberlite XAD-2，XAD-4，XAD-16 或 XAD-1180 -41 - i紙張尺度逍用中國國家標準（CNS ) A4规格（210X297公釐） ~ ---------f Λ------IT------f (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁)Symposium, Vienna 1973, p241, International Atomic Energy authority. These methods include ionizing radiation, chemical methods such as N-methyl-N'-nitro-N-nitroisomai (n TG), thermal 'gene technology' such as gene recombination and gene conversion, treatment, and Selective natural variant technology. The preparation of the compound of formula (XII) by fermentation can be accomplished by traditional methods, that is, cultivating suitable microorganisms in the presence of assimilable sources of carbon, nitrogen, and mineral salts, and then isolating the desired product. The sources of assimilable carbon, nitrogen, and mineral salts can be supplied by simple or compound nutrients. Carbon sources generally include glucose, maltose, starch, glycerin, molasses dextrin, lactose, sucrose, fruit sugar, galactose, inositol, D_mannose 'soybean oil' carboxylic acid, amino acid 'glyceride, alcohol , Alkanes and vegetable oils. The carbon source generally constitutes 0.5 to 10% by weight of the fermentation base. Fruit sugar 'glucose and sucrose represent preferred carbon sources. Nitrogen sources generally include soybean meal, corn broth, lees, yeast extract, cottonseed meal, glands, ground hard fruit powder, malt extract, molasses, casein 'amino acid mixture, ammonia (gas or solution ), Ammonium or nitrate, urea and other amides can also be used. Nitrogen sources generally constitute 0.01 to 10% by weight of the fermentation base. The nutrient mineral salts that can be used in the culture medium include commonly used sodium, sodium, aluminum, iron, iron, zinc, aluminum, aluminum, phosphate, sulfate, Salts of vapors and carbonate ions. -40- This paper scale is applicable to China ’s B Family Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297 public daughter (please read the precautions on the back and then fill out this page) Λ. Order the Ministry of Economic Affairs, Central Bureau of Industry and Commerce Printing Co., Ltd. Printed by the Central Sassafrass Bureau Beigong Consumer Cooperative A7 ---------- V. Description of the invention (38) One *-The cultivation of microorganisms is generally at 20. To 40 ° C, preferably 2 〇. (: To 35C 'especially about 25. (:, sometimes need to be carried out under ventilation and shaking (such as shaking or stirring). At the beginning of the medium can be inoculated with a small amount of mycelium and / or spores obtained The plant-based inoculum can be transferred to the fermentation substrate, or to one or more seed stages, where it is further grown, and then transferred to the main fermentation substrate. The fermentation is generally carried out at pH 3.5 to 9.5, preferably 4.5 to 7.5. It may be necessary to add alkali or acid to the fermentation substrate to maintain the pH in the desired range. Suitable alkalis that can be added include alkali metal hydroxides, such as aqueous sodium hydroxide or potassium hydroxide. Suitable acids include Mineral acids, such as hydrochloric acid, sulfuric acid or succinic acid .. Fermentation can be carried out 4-30 , Preferably about 5-15 days. To control excessive foaming, anti-foaming agent can be added, the time of addition depends on the need. Carbon and / or nitrogen source can also be added to the fermentation matrix as needed. Compound of formula (XII) Mainly attached to cells, it can be added with acid or water-soluble organic solvent, more preferably with alkali (such as sodium hydroxide) to make a solution. The cells in the solution can be separated by centrifugation, traditional filtration method or membrane filtration This liquid can be re-used with acid, such as sulfuric acid, if necessary, and treated to a pH of less than 6 (eg, about 4.5). The compound of formula (XII) can be separated and purified by various distribution techniques, such as washing away by adsorption, Shen Dian, classification: Crystallization, solvent extraction, and liquid-liquid distribution methods can also be used in combination. Separation and purification of the compound of formula (IX) is most suitable for adsorption on a solid support followed by washing away. Suitable solid supports include dioxide ; Non-functional large-mesh adsorption resins, such as cross-linked styrene divinylbenzene polymer resins, such as CG161 and Amberlite XAD-2, XAD-4, XAD-16 or XAD-1180 -41 -i China National Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297 PCT) ~ --------- f Λ ------ IT ------ f (Please read the Notes on the back to fill out this page)

樹脂（Rohm &amp; Haas Limited)或Kastell SI 12 (Montedison); 經取代的苯乙烯二乙晞基苯聚合物，如Diaion SP207 (Mitsubishi);陰離子交換器[例如 ira-958 或 MacroPrep High Q (BioRad)]，與有機溶劑相容的交聯的葡聚糖，如 Sephadex LH20 (Pharmacia UK Limited)，或反相支撑，如 聯與烴屬的二氧化矽，例如C18•相聯的二氧化矽。 式（XII)化合物也可使用液體陰離子交換器，如LA2，分 離並純化。 合適的洗離式（XII)化合物用的溶劑自然視吸附的性質而 定。在使用聚合物樹脂（如X AD-16)時，可用與水相溶的 溶劑，如甲醇，丙酮，異丙醇或乙腈，可與水作不同比例 使用。 在萃取/分離過程中，式（χπ)化合物的存在可利用次化 物的光旋性質或其他性質藉傳統技術，如高效液體色譜法 (HPLC)或UV光譜法，鑑測。 經濟部中央樣準局—工消費合作社印策 (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁)Resin (Rohm &amp; Haas Limited) or Kastell SI 12 (Montedison); substituted styrene diethylbenzylbenzene polymer, such as Diaion SP207 (Mitsubishi); anion exchanger [eg ira-958 or MacroPrep High Q (BioRad )], Cross-linked dextran compatible with organic solvents, such as Sephadex LH20 (Pharmacia UK Limited), or reversed-phase supports, such as silicon dioxide with hydrocarbons, such as C18 • linked silica. The compound of formula (XII) can also be separated and purified using a liquid anion exchanger such as LA2. A suitable solvent for washing away the compound of formula (XII) will naturally depend on the nature of the adsorption. When using polymer resins (such as X AD-16), solvents that are compatible with water, such as methanol, acetone, isopropanol, or acetonitrile, can be used in different proportions with water. During the extraction / separation process, the presence of the compound of formula (χπ) can be detected by using the optical rotation property or other properties of the secondary compound by traditional techniques, such as high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) or UV spectroscopy. 、1T 在取得的式（XII)化合物是有機溶劑内的溶液形式時，例 如以吸附/洗離所取得者，溶劑可藉傳統方法，例如蒸發 ’製得所需化合物。如有必要，此化合物還可進一步用色 層分析技術純化，如使用旋轉萃取器（如多層旋管萃取器） 作反流色層分析，或於有或無鍵合相的吸附劑（如碳，氧化 銘’訊’聚合樹脂或二氧化矽）上作高效液體色譜分析或超 臨界流體色譜分析。適於式（χπ)化合物色譜分析純化/分 離的合適·的溶劑/洗離劑自然視吸附劑的性質而定。在使 用C 8鍵合二氧化矽時，以乙腈及水的混合物爲最合適。或 ____- 42 - 本紙張尺i遗用中國國家標準（( 21〇&gt;&lt;297公釐） - A7 B7 經濟部中央棣準局員工消費合作社印製 五、發明説明（40 ) 者，此化合物可進一步以溶劑萃取純化，例如使用合適的 有機溶劑，如網（例如丙酮或甲基乙基酮），南素化的烴屬 ，醇（例如曱醇），二醇（例如丙烷-1,2-二醇或丁烷_：ι，3_二 醇），或酯（例如醋酸甲酯或醋酸乙酯）。另一種純化方法， 使式（XII)化合物溶液以吸附劑處理，此種吸附劑（如 DEAE-纖維素）所加的量適宜時可選擇性地除去雜質，或以 重結晶法純化（例如用乙腈及水的混合物重結晶），或合併 使用上述諸法純化。 將索達林作生物轉化成4，-脱甲基索達林，及式（χπ)化 合物，可藉將索達林在含有合適的微生物及碳源與氮源， 包括上述的各源’的培養物中培養’然後從培養物中分離 式（XII)化合物。1T When the compound of formula (XII) obtained is in the form of a solution in an organic solvent, such as those obtained by adsorption / washing, the solvent can be prepared by conventional methods, such as evaporation. If necessary, this compound can be further purified by chromatography, such as using a rotary extractor (such as a multi-layer coil extractor) for countercurrent chromatography, or with or without a bonded phase adsorbent (such as carbon , Oxidation Ming 'Xun' polymer resin or silica) for high-performance liquid chromatography or supercritical fluid chromatography. The suitable solvent / eluting agent suitable for the purification / separation of the compound of formula (χπ) by chromatographic analysis naturally depends on the nature of the adsorbent. When using C 8 bonded silica, a mixture of acetonitrile and water is most suitable. Invention Instructions (40), This compound can be further purified by solvent extraction, for example, using a suitable organic solvent, such as a net (such as acetone or methyl ethyl ketone), a sulfonated genus, alcohol (such as methanol), diol (such as propane-1 , 2-diol or butane _: ι, 3_ diol), or ester (such as methyl acetate or ethyl acetate). Another purification method, the compound of formula (XII) solution is treated with an adsorbent, such The amount of adsorbent (such as DEAE-cellulose) can be selectively removed when appropriate, or purified by recrystallization (for example, recrystallized with a mixture of acetonitrile and water), or combined to purify using the above methods. Darling is biologically converted into 4, -demethyl sodarin and a compound of formula (χπ). Sodarin can be used in a culture containing suitable microorganisms, carbon sources and nitrogen sources, including the above sources' Medium culture 'and then the compound of formula (XII) is isolated from the culture.

能使索達林於4’-位脱甲基的微生物可用小尺度試驗並用 標準方法分析取得的試驗樣品（如用HPLC分析）確定。已證 實能使索達林脱甲基的微生物的例包括纏繞鍵露菌ATC：C： 31963’ Strepomyces avermitillis ATCC 31272，畜群鍵霉菌 NRRL 3176，拉生鏈霉菌ATCC 31771 ^龜裂鏈霉菌ATCC 23955，普拉特鏈霉菌ΑΤΓ,Γ. 29778，馬書鏈霉菌ATCC 23934 泛溫鏈霉菌ATCC 14975 »東方諾卡氏菌ATCC 43491，及長刺孢小克銀漢霖ΑΤΓΓ 36112 ° 微生物之培養可於20。至4(TC，較佳是20。至35Ό，最 佳是約28°C行之，有時需在通風及振盪（如搖動或攪掉）下 進行。培養基内開始時可接種少量的菌絲體及/或孢子。 所得的植物性接種物可轉移至發酵基質，或者轉移至一個 -43- ---------f I------、w------ (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) 本紙張尺度適用中國國家標準（CNS ) 格（210X297公癀） 經濟部中央樣準局貝工消費合作社印製 321644 A7 B7 五、發明説明（41 ) 多個種台（seed stages)，於該處進一步生長（例如約1-3天) ，然後再轉移至主發酵基質。主發酵基質也可含索達林， 且發酵一般在pH 3.5至9·5進行，較佳是4 5至7 5。發酵基 質内可能需加瞼或酸以維持pH在所需範圍内。可加的合適 的檢包括氫氧化鹼金屬，例如氫氧化鈉或氫氧化鉀水溶液 。合適的酸包括礦物酸，如鹽酸，硫酸或磷酸。發酵可進 行2 - 5天，較佳是約3天。爲控制起泡過多可加抗起泡劑， 加入時距視需要而定。碳及/或氮源也可視需要加於發酵 基質内。. 從發酵肉湯中分離式（XII)化合物可以前述一般方法進行 。在需要將液體pH降至6以下時（如約2.5)，可以加酸，如 正鱗酸，達成。 應知’生物轉化可根據各種方法完成。例如，細胞可於 加入索達林於例如緩衝劑、用過的發酵基質及水内的溶液 之前接種並收穫。另外，分離並使用合適的酶（同時用合適 的輔酶）或使酶克隆化並過度表達也是可行的。 如上所述，索達林及索達里新都是已知的化合物，可以 有關技藝所述方法製得。是以，例如，英國專利説明 1，162,027號敘述培養蛛網糞殼菌NRRL 3196(t&amp;ATCC 363 86存儲於ATCC)製備索達林。後面將述及以類似方法製 備索達林的特定實例。Microorganisms capable of demethylating sodarin at the 4'-position can be determined by small-scale tests and analysis of test samples obtained by standard methods (such as HPLC analysis). Examples of microorganisms that have been shown to demethylate sodarin include A. tangutorium ATC: C: 31963 'Strepomyces avermitillis ATCC 31272, herd key mold NRRL 3176, Streptomyces praxis ATCC 31771 ^ Streptomyces spp. ATCC 23955 , Streptomyces platatus ΑΓΓ, Γ. 29778, Streptomyces mascus ATCC 23934 Streptomyces pantherus ATCC 14975 »Nocardia orientalis ATCC 43491, and Agaricus lanceolata A. ΓΓ 36112 ° microorganisms can be cultured at 20. To 4 (TC, preferably 20. To 35Ό, most preferably about 28 ° C, sometimes need to be carried out under ventilation and shaking (such as shaking or stirring). The culture medium can be inoculated with a small amount of hypha Body and / or spores. The resulting plant inoculum can be transferred to the fermentation substrate, or to a -43- --------- f I ------, w ------ (Please read the precautions on the back before filling in this page) This paper scale is applicable to the Chinese National Standard (CNS) grid (210X297 Gonghuang) Printed 321644 A7 B7 by the Beigong Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Standards of the Ministry of Economy V. Description of invention (41 ) Multiple seed stages, where they are further grown (for example, about 1-3 days), and then transferred to the main fermentation substrate. The main fermentation substrate can also contain sodarin, and the fermentation is generally at pH 3.5 to 9 • 5 is carried out, preferably 4 5 to 75. The fermentation medium may need to add eyelid or acid to maintain the pH in the desired range. Suitable tests may include alkali metal hydroxide, such as sodium hydroxide or hydroxide Potassium aqueous solution. Suitable acids include mineral acids such as hydrochloric acid, sulfuric acid or phosphoric acid. Fermentation can be carried out for 2 to 5 days, preferably about 3 days. If there is too much foaming, anti-foaming agent can be added. The time of addition depends on the need. The carbon and / or nitrogen source can also be added to the fermentation matrix as needed. Carry out. When it is necessary to reduce the pH of the liquid to below 6 (such as about 2.5), you can add acid, such as orthosquaric acid, to achieve. It should be understood that biotransformation can be completed according to various methods. For example, buffers, used fermentation substrates and solutions in water are inoculated and harvested before. In addition, it is also feasible to isolate and use appropriate enzymes (while using appropriate coenzymes) or to clone and overexpress the enzymes. As mentioned above, Both Sodarin and Sodarin are known compounds and can be prepared by the method described in the art. Therefore, for example, British Patent No. 1,162,027 describes the cultivation of D. arachnoidis NRRL 3196 (t &amp; ATCC 363 86 Stored at ATCC) to prepare sodarin. Specific examples of preparing sodarin in a similar manner will be described later.

索達里新可以使用蛛網糞殼菌NRRL 3196或其合適的變 種製備索達林所用的類似發酵方法製備，使用合適的色譜 分析分離所需化合物。一種此種變種已存儲於英國CAB _ - 44 - 本紙張尺度適用中國阐家梯準（CNS ) A4*L格（210X297公釐） (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) ί&lt; 、π 經濟部中央標準局貝工消費合作社印製 A7 B7 五、發明説明（42 )Sodarin can be prepared using a similar fermentation method used to prepare Sodarin using D. arachnoides NRRL 3196 or a suitable variant thereof, using appropriate chromatographic analysis to isolate the desired compound. One such variant has been stored in the British CAB _-44-This paper scale is suitable for China's Jiejia Step Standard (CNS) A4 * L grid (210X297mm) (Please read the precautions on the back before filling this page) π A7 B7 printed by Beigong Consumer Cooperative of Central Bureau of Standards of the Ministry of Economy V. Description of invention (42)

International Mycological Institute, Genetic Resource Reference Collection Bakeham Lane, Egham, Surrey TW20 9TY。此菌株係於1994年8月11日由此機構收到，給予的 取得編號爲IMI 362947，存活證實曰期分別爲1994年8月 19日。此機構依布達佩斯條約被承認爲國際存儲 (International Depository)權威。就IMI 362947到目前爲止 所證實的特性見實例26所述。 本發明進一步提供微生物IMI 362947本身及其突變種。 取得IMI 362947變種及其基因物質的方法與前述操作IMI 362184之方法相似。 索達里新也可使用生物轉化法由索達林製備。生物轉化 的完成是：將索達林於含有合適的微生物及碳源與氮源（包 括前述的各種碳源與氮源）的培養物内培育，然後從培養物 内分離索達里新。 能使索達林轉化成索達里新的微生物可用小尺度試驗並 用標準方法分析取得的試驗樣品（如用HPLC分析）確定。發 明人等已證實一種此種微生物，並已存入National Collections of Industrial and Marine Bacteria Limited (NCIMB), 23 St. Machar Drive, Aberdeen AB2 1RY,International Mycological Institute, Genetic Resource Reference Collection Bakeham Lane, Egham, Surrey TW20 9TY. This strain was received by this institution on August 11, 1994, and the obtained accession number was IMI 362947, and the date of survival confirmation was August 19, 1994, respectively. This institution is recognized as an international depository authority under the Budapest Treaty. See Example 26 for the characteristics demonstrated so far by IMI 362947. The present invention further provides the microorganism IMI 362947 itself and its mutants. The method for obtaining the IMI 362947 variant and its genetic material is similar to the method for operating IMI 362184 described above. Sodarin can also be prepared from Sodarin using biotransformation. The biotransformation is accomplished by growing Sodarin in a culture containing suitable microorganisms and carbon and nitrogen sources (including the aforementioned various carbon and nitrogen sources), and then separating Sodarin from the culture. New microorganisms that can convert Sodarin into Sodarin can be determined by small-scale tests and analysis of test samples obtained by standard methods (such as HPLC analysis). The inventors have confirmed one such microorganism and have deposited it in National Collections of Industrial and Marine Bacteria Limited (NCIMB), 23 St. Machar Drive, Aberdeen AB2 1RY,

Scotland。NCIMB於1994年8月4日收到此菌株，於同一天 接受此菌株作專利並證實此微生物爲活的。此微生物爲棒 狀菌種（Coryneform species)，其特徵如實例2 7所述，已被 指定爲NCIMB 40675號。MCIMB爲布達佩斯條約所承認的 International Depository 權威。 -45- 本紙張尺度逋用中國國家橾準（CNS ) A4规格（210X297公釐） (請先閱讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) %Λ·Scotland. NCIMB received this strain on August 4, 1994 and accepted the strain as a patent on the same day and confirmed that the microorganism was alive. This microorganism is a Coryneform species, and its characteristics are as described in Example 27, and it has been designated as NCIMB No. 40675. MCIMB is the international depository authority recognized by the Budapest Treaty. -45- This paper uses the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 standard (210X297mm) (Please read the precautions on the back before filling this page)

，tT 經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印製 38ι^44 Α7 Β7 五、發明説明（43) 是以本發明另一方面還提供NCIMB 40675微生物及其變 種。 根據本發明另一方面，發明人等提供NCIMB 40675及其 變種的基因物質，可使索達林轉化成索達里斯。 取得NCIMB 40675變種及其基因的方法與前述操作IMI 362184的方法相似。 NCIMB 40675之培養可於20。至4〇。(：，較佳是20。至35 C，最佳是約28°C行之，有時需在通風及振盪（如搖動或攪 拌）下進行。培養基内開始時可接種少量的菌絲體及/或孢 子。所得的植物性接種物可轉移至發酵基質，或者轉移至 一或多個種台（seed stages )，於該處進一步生長（例如約工_ 3天），然後再轉移至主發酵基質。主發酵基質也可含索達 林，且發酵一般在pH 3.5至9.5進行，較佳是4·5至75。發 酵基質内可能需加鹼或酸以維持ρΗ在所需範圍内。可加的 合適的鹼包括氫氧化鹼金屬，例如氫氧化鈉或氫氧化鉀水 溶液。合適的酸包括礦物酸，如鹽酸，硫酸或磷酸。發酵 可進仃4 - 8天，較佳是約6天。爲控制起泡過多可加抗起泡 劑，加入時距視需要而定。碳及/或氮源也可視需要加於 發酵基質内。 ' 應知，生物轉化可根據各種方法完成。例如，細胞可於 加入索達林於例如緩衝劑、用過的發酵基質及水内的溶液 又前接種並收穫。另外，分離並使用合適的酶（同時用合適 的輔酶）或使酶克隆化並過度表達也是可行的。 索達里新由發酵肉湯之分離可以前述一般方法行之。在 (請先閱讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) 、11Printed by the employee consumer cooperative of the Central Standardization Bureau of the Ministry of Economic Affairs 38ι ^ 44 Α7 Β7 V. Description of the invention (43) The NCIMB 40675 microorganism and its variants are also provided on the other hand of the present invention. According to another aspect of the present invention, the inventors provided the genetic material of NCIMB 40675 and its variants, which can convert sodarin to sodaris. The method for obtaining the NCIMB 40675 variant and its genes is similar to the method for operating IMI 362184 described above. NCIMB 40675 can be cultivated on 20. To 40. (:, Preferably 20. to 35 C, most preferably about 28 ° C. Sometimes it needs to be carried out under ventilation and shaking (such as shaking or stirring). A small amount of mycelium and / Or spores. The resulting plant inoculum can be transferred to the fermentation substrate, or transferred to one or more seed stages (seed stages), where it is further grown (for example, about 3 days), and then transferred to the main fermentation Substrate. The main fermentation substrate may also contain sodarin, and the fermentation is generally carried out at a pH of 3.5 to 9.5, preferably 4.5 to 75. It may be necessary to add alkali or acid to the fermentation substrate to maintain the pH in the desired range. Suitable bases to be added include alkali metal hydroxides, such as aqueous sodium hydroxide or potassium hydroxide. Suitable acids include mineral acids such as hydrochloric acid, sulfuric acid or phosphoric acid. Fermentation can take 4-8 days, preferably about 6 days . To control excessive foaming, anti-foaming agents can be added, the time of addition depends on the need. Carbon and / or nitrogen sources can also be added to the fermentation substrate as needed. ”It should be understood that biotransformation can be accomplished according to various methods. Cells can be added to sodarin in eg buffers, used The solution in the fermentation substrate and water is inoculated and harvested. In addition, it is also feasible to isolate and use the appropriate enzyme (while using the appropriate coenzyme) or to clone and overexpress the enzyme. Sodarin is separated from the fermentation broth It can be done by the general method mentioned above. (Please read the precautions on the back before filling this page), 11

Preparation 1 Production of sodarin The culture of arachnid arachnoides NRRL3196 (ATCC 36386) and agar medium were grown to maturity. Move the 6 mm agar plug containing the mature bacteria to sterile water or Brain Heart Infusion broth (Oxoid) + 10% glycerol, and store at ambient temperature or _i 4〇, respectively. A 250 ml Erlenmyer flask containing 50 ml FS medium was incubated with a suspension containing 2 of this agar plug. The broth is shaken at 300-350 rpm and aerated at a rate of 200 liters / min. Add 70% (weight / volume) Meritose (Tunnel Refineries) solution to the culture to maintain positive residual Portuguese _ -48- This paper scale uses the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X2.97mm) (please Please read the precautions on the back and then fill out this page) * Λ. Order the A7 _ _____B7__ printed by the Staff Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Standards of the Ministry of Economy. V. Invention Instructions (46) Sugar Concentration. Distilled water was added to maintain the culture volume at 500 liters. Add PPG2000 anti-foaming agent as needed to control foaming. Reverse phase HPLC was used to identify Sodarin in all broth extracts (+ 1% trifluoroacetic acid in acetonitrile in water). After n days', the culture was harvested when the broth extract sample showed a sodarin titer of 0.6 g / liter. Make the fermentation broth contain 0.1M sodium hydroxide, store it at ambient temperature overnight and filter with Dicalite on the rotary hollow filter (add 10/0 Dicalite as a filter aid in the broth). The filtrate was adjusted to 6-7 with concentrated sulfuric acid to 6-7, and this solution was added to XAD16 resin (10 times the volume of the filtrate / resin). Wash the adsorbent with water and acetone / water (1: 3) to get a clear effluent, and then _ wash away the sodarin with acetone: water (3: 1; charge two column volume). The flow rate for this process is 1-2 column volumes / hour. Concentrate the eluate to a small volume (85 liters). The pH of the concentrate was adjusted to 3 with squamous acid, and the sodarin precipitated out by standing at ambient temperature overnight. Pour out the floating solution, then centrifuge to discard the floating solution. Dissolve the centrifugal pills and the precipitate in 75% acetonitrile aqueous solution to obtain 3.9 liters of dark standard solution. To this solution was added 1.0 liter of 0.2M NH4Η2Ρ04 'under stirring, and then the pH of the solution was adjusted to 4.0 with squamous acid, and the final volume was 5.0 liter with nearly 60% acetonitrile_〇im NH4H2P〇4. The above crude Sodarin solution (5_0 liter) was subjected to preparative HPLC treatment with 10 injections (450-550 ml each time) on a 7 mm Kromasil C8 column (15 cm X 25 cm) with a mobile phase of 50% Acetonitrile-0.1 \ 1> 1114112? 〇4, ie 114 (add 50 liters of water to 100 liters of acetone 'containing 575 grams of NH4H2P〇4 and 40 milliliters of h3P〇4), with a flow rate of 600 milliliters / minute, with UV absorbance Nano) determination. Collect eluent in portions between 15.4 and 19.2 minutes. Concentrate 10 injections of eluent (2 3 liters), dilute with water to 50 liters, and then use this solution at 28-49-paper size to use the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 specifications (210X297 %) ---- --------- 'X II 〆 (please read the precautions on the back before filling in this page), 11 A7 38l644 ._____ B7 V. Description of the invention (47) Liter / hour speed Haw back through the Kromasil column. The column was washed with water (25 liters) and then washed away with 90% acetonitrile (10 liters). The eluate was evaporated to 300 ml of residue, and then dried to prepare the title compound as a beige powder (105.6 g). The product was analyzed by mass spectrometry (MS) and nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) and showed the same as the confirmed sodarin sample. Preparation 2 Production of Sodarin_Salt The D. arachnoidis NRRL 3196 (ATCC 36386) was stored in brain-heart infusion broth at + 140 ° C + 10% glycerol as described in Preparation 1. A suspension containing 2 fat plugs was used to inoculate a 250 ml Erlenmy er flask containing 50 ml FS medium. This culture is 25 on a rotary shaker. (: Incubate for 5 days. This rotary shaker is operated at 250 rpm on a 50 mm diameter track. The entire (2 ml) of the developed inoculum is then inoculated into 250 ml of 250 containing FS medium (50 ml) Inoculate Erlenmyer flasks, cultivated as described above. Inoculate two fermenters containing 5 liters of FS medium each of 7 liters with 80 mL of inoculum developed in the shaking flask. Fermentation is controlled at a temperature of 25 ° C. Shake at 400 rpm and ventilate at a rate of 2 liters / minute. After 3 days of fermentation, inoculate a 780 liter fermentor containing 500 liters of SD1 medium with 10 liters of culture. -50- This paper size Applicable to China National Standard (CNS) M specifications (210X 297mm) (Please read the precautions on the back before filling in this page) νΛ Printed Bag A7 B7 of the Employees Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Standards, Ministry of Economic Affairs

The broth is shaken at 350 rpm and aerated at a rate of 200 liters / min. Add distilled water to maintain the culture volume at 500 liters. The presence of Sodarin was identified by reverse-phase HPLC. After 6 days of culture, the culture was harvested when the broth extract sample showed a soda titre of 1.3 g / liter. Make 50 ml of harvest broth sample containing 0.1 M sodium hydroxide and store at 4 ° C overnight. Add 2 ° / 〇 of Dicalite to the broth as a filter aid and use a Dicalite bed as a filter to remove the cells. The filtrate was adjusted to pH 6 with concentrated sulfuric acid to nearly 6. The broth extract was pumped through the Amberchrom CG161 resin bed at 320 mL / min (0.64 bed volume per minute). The effluent was identified by HPLC. After 45 minutes (equivalent to 14.4 liters of pumping volume), Sodarin started to pass through and stopped pumping. The adsorbate is washed with water (2 liters), and then with 25% volume / volume water-51-This paper size is used by the Chinese National Standard (CNS) 4 ^ and (21〇297297mm) (please read the back page first (Notes and then fill out this page) * Λ. Order ^^ 1644 A7 Printed by the Consumer Cooperative of the Central Standards Bureau of the Ministry of Economic Affairs Β7. The invention description (49) is washed with acetone (2 liters). Wash off Sodarin with acetone (15 litres) in 75% volume / volume water. The 75% volume / volume acetone was washed away at 40. (: Rotary evaporate to about 200 ml. Add 200 ml of butan-1-ol, and then evaporate to a dry oil body (containing a little butan-1-ol). The oily residue is then heated with methanol (2 X 500 ml) extraction. Combine the extracts, filter (Whatman No. 1 paper), and evaporate at 40 to 45 ° C to obtain a dry oil body. Then extract with propylene (2x 500 ml). Combine the acetone extracts, Filter and evaporate to a viscous oil body. Add propane _ 2 · alcohol (350 ml), this oil body dissolves at 4 5 ° C to a clear brown solution. The potassium 2-ethylhexanoate solution (39% Weight / weight solution in propane-2 alcohol, 54 g) was weighed into a 500 ml Erlenmeyer flask. The propane-2-alcohol solution containing Sodarin was poured into the Erlenmeyer flask, the contents were mixed and placed in the chamber Allow to stand for 4 hours. Sodium hydrochloride (approximately 5 mg) is planted in this solution. The flask is stoppered and stored at 4 ° C for 3 days. The off-white solid formed by air filtration (using a No. 4 porous funnel) is filtered The cake was washed with propane-2-ol (approximately 20-30 mL). The solid was transferred to a crystallization dish and dried on P205 for 16 hours to prepare the title compound ( 10.5 g). The Dicalite bed is filtered on a rotary air filter. 1% Dicalite is added as a filter aid in the broth. The pH of the filtrate is adjusted from 9.6 to 7.5 with concentrated sulfuric acid. 、發明説明（5〇) 經濟部中央梯準局員工消費合作社印製 脂床’再用25%異丙醇水溶液（2 5床容積）洗，然後以淨異 丙醇洗離。待先流出5〇毫升後，分批各收取1〇〇毫升異丙 醇洗離物。將2-6份富含索達林的部分集中，並蒸發成半容 積。加異丙醇使容積再回至500毫升，重複蒸發至半容積， 以共沛蒸發去殘餘的水。待第三次蒸發至半容積後，將殘 餘物過遽，濾過器用異丙醇洗。於合併的濾過物及洗液 (400毫升）内加2 -乙基己酸鉀（8克）於異丙醉（1〇〇毫升）内的 溶液。此混合物内種索達林鉀鹽，於4。〇靜置數天，即緩慢 形成結晶。於3號多孔過濾器上過濾結晶’用少許冰冷的異 丙醇洗，眞空乾燥，即製得標題化合物，爲棕色粉（4.85克） 〇 t脱甲基索这汰之+產 (0以製備1所述方法將IMI3 62 1 84於-14(TC維持於腦心 輸液肉湯+ 1 0 %甘油内。用含2個瓊脂塞的懸浮液接種 於含50毫升FS培養基的250毫升的Erlenmyer燒瓶内。 此培養物於迴轉搖動器上於25°C培育5天，此迴轉搖動 器於50毫米直徑的軌道上以250轉/分鐘操作。用整份 (2毫升）已發展的種菌再接種於250毫升含FS培養基 (50毫升）的250毫升Erlenmyer燒瓶内，以上述方法培 育。用80毫升於搖動燒瓶内發展的種菌接種於二個各7 公升的含5公升FS培養基的發酵器内。發酵控制於25 °C的溫度。此培養物以400轉/分鐘搖動，並以2公升 /分鐘的速度通氣。發酵3天後，用1〇公升培養物接種 53 1紙張尺度逍用中國國家揉準（&lt;：阳）八4规格（210父297公釐） (请先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) 4*λ. 訂 A7 ^^1644 B7 五、發明説明（51 ) 於500公升SM55VAR培養基的780公升的發酵器内（如 製備1所述）。將發酵控制於25 °C的溫度。將肉湯以350 轉/分鐘振動，並以500公升/分鐘的速度通氣。培養 物内加 70 % 重量 / 容積的 Meritose (Tunnel Refineries) 溶液，以維持正殘餘葡萄糖濃度。加蒸餾水以維持培 養物容積爲500公升。以反相HPLC鑑定全部肉湯萃取 物内4'-脱甲基索達林的存在。培養10天後在肉湯萃取 物樣品顯示4'-脱甲基索達林滴定度爲0.8克/公升時， 收穫培養物。使發酵肉湯含0.1M的氫氧化鈉，於週邊 溫度過1小時後，用Dicalite於迴轉眞空過濾器上過濾（ 肉湯内加1 % Dicalite作爲過濾助劑）。以濃硫酸將濾過 物pH調整至4.5，將此溶液加於XAD16樹脂（20克產物 /公升樹脂）。吸附物以0.1 %磷酸（10柱容積）洗，在以 乙腈：水1 : 4 (6柱容積）洗，然後用乙腈：水（丨：1 ; 2 柱容積）洗離產物。此過程的流速爲1 _ 2柱容積/小時 。加丁烷-1 -醇使洗離物濃縮至乾，用甲醇（1 2公升）萃 取固禮，再於60 °C以丙酮（1〇公升）萃取。每一步驟都 以3號玻璃多孔過濾器除去不溶解的物質，再將萃取物 如前法濃縮至乾。以乙腈：水（3 : 7)結晶出固體，再 用相同溶劑重結晶，於P 2 〇 5上乾燥至恆定重量，即製 得標題化合物（244.0克），以質子NMR分析顯示與已確 定之4'-脱甲基索達林相同。 (ii)依（i)發酵方法，在肉湯加0.1M氫氧化鈉後，用ETNA 10A膜（10K Dalton cut-off)作超過濾。以水作滲過濾後 -54- 本紙張尺度逍用中國國家揉準（CNS ) A4規格（210X297公羞) (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) fc.A_ 、?τ 經濟部中央標準扃—工消費合作社印裝 ^2164 4 A7 B7 經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印裝 五、發明説明（52) ’滲出物爲澄清溶液。以濃硫酸將pH調整至5.2後，將 滲出物載於XAD16樹脂柱上，載速爲2柱容積/小時， 最終每公升樹脂載32克4，-脱甲基索達林。此柱以0.1% 容積/容積磷酸洗，再以20%容積/容積乙腈/水洗（ 每種都是10柱容積），洗速爲2柱容積/小時。此柱以 6 5 %乙腈/水洗離，洗離速爲2柱容積/小時。棄掉先 流出的0·75柱容積，由後來1.6柱容積的洗離物收取 85%載入的4··脱甲基索達林。此多量的洗離物以2〇/〇重 量/容積的DE52纖維素攪拌5分鐘處理，然後再取出 過濾。將等分以DE52處理過的洗離物用迴轉蒸發器濃 縮至原容積（4 3 %乙腈）的6 2 %。將濃縮過的洗離物於4 保持1 5小時以結晶，以玻璃多孔過濾器過濾收取的 固體。結晶用4餅容積的3 0 %容積/容積乙腈/水洗， 於3 0 °C眞空乾燥。由濃縮洗離物收取的標題化物（〗94 克）爲淺灰色固體。 製備5 能於4'位使索達林脱甲基的微生物的篩潠 能於卩位使索達林脱甲基的微生物，可藉使其於28。(：（細 菌）或25°C (眞菌）生長於50毫升錐形燒瓶内的1〇毫升容積 的SB1(細菌）或FBI(眞菌）内確證，此燒瓶以250轉/分鐘 搖動。2天後，加索達林至終濃度爲0· 5毫克/毫升（取自於 80 %乙醇内的200毫克/毫升儲存溶液），再將燒瓶培育3天 。由整個培養物取500微升樣品與500微升80%的乙腈/2% 三氟醋酸在Eppendorf管内混合，並任其於室溫萃取3〇分鐘 -55- 本紙張尺度適用中國國家揉準（CNS ) A4规格（210X297公釐) I&quot;-------— —.— I (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁)3. Description of the invention (50) The grease bed printed by the Employee Consumer Cooperative of the Central Bureau of Economic Development of the Ministry of Economic Affairs was washed with a 25% aqueous solution of isopropyl alcohol (25 bed volume) and then washed away with net isopropyl alcohol. After 50 ml was flowed out, 100 ml of isopropanol was collected in batches. Collect 2-6 parts rich in sodarin and evaporate to half volume. Isopropanol was added to bring the volume back to 500 ml, and the evaporation was repeated to half volume to co-evaporate the remaining water. After the third evaporation to half volume, the residue was passed through and the filter was washed with isopropyl alcohol. A solution of potassium 2-ethylhexanoate (8g) in isopropyl alcohol (100ml) was added to the combined filtrate and wash (400ml). Sodium hydrochloride is grown in this mixture. 〇 Crystals formed slowly after standing for several days. Filter the crystals on the No. 3 porous filter, wash with a little ice-cold isopropanol, and dry it to obtain the title compound as a brown powder (4.85g). The rotary shaker was operated at 250 rpm on a 50 mm diameter track. The whole (2 ml) of the developed inoculum was re-inoculated in The 250 ml Erlenmyer flask containing FS medium (50 ml) was cultivated as described above. 80 ml of inoculum developed in the shaking flask was inoculated into two 7 liter fermentors containing 5 liter FS medium. Fermentation Controlled at a temperature of 25 ° C. The culture was shaken at 400 rpm and aerated at a rate of 2 liters / minute. After 3 days of fermentation, the 10 liter culture was used to inoculate 53 1 paper scales. (&Lt;: Yang) Eight 4 specifications (210 father 297 mm) (please Read the notes on the back and fill in this page) 4 * λ. Order A7 ^^ 1644 B7 5. Description of the invention (51) In a 780-liter fermenter of 500-liter SM55VAR medium (as described in Preparation 1). Control the fermentation At a temperature of 25 ° C. The broth is shaken at 350 rpm and aerated at a rate of 500 liters / minute. A 70% weight / volume Meritose (Tunnel Refineries) solution is added to the culture to maintain a positive residual glucose concentration Add distilled water to maintain the volume of the culture to 500 liters. Identify the presence of 4'-demethyl sodarin in all broth extracts by reversed-phase HPLC. Samples of the broth extract show 4'-dehydration after 10 days of culture When the titer of methyl sodarin is 0.8 g / L, the culture is harvested. Make the fermentation broth contain 0.1 M sodium hydroxide, and after 1 hour at the ambient temperature, use Dicalite to filter on the rotary empty filter (broth Add 1% Dicalite as a filter aid.) Adjust the pH of the filtrate to 4.5 with concentrated sulfuric acid, add this solution to XAD16 resin (20 g product / liter resin). The adsorbate is washed with 0.1% phosphoric acid (10 column volume) , In acetonitrile: water 1: 4 (6 column volume ) Wash, and then wash away the product with acetonitrile: water (丨: 1; 2 column volume). The flow rate of this process is 1 _ 2 column volume / hour. Add butane-1-ol to concentrate the eluate to dryness, use Methanol (12 liters) was extracted and solidified, and then extracted with acetone (10 liters) at 60 ° C. In each step, the insoluble material was removed with a No. 3 glass porous filter, and then the extract was concentrated to dry. The solid was crystallized from acetonitrile: water (3: 7), then recrystallized from the same solvent, and dried to a constant weight on P 2 〇5 to obtain the title compound (244.0 g), which was confirmed by proton NMR analysis. 4'-demethyl sodarin is the same. (ii) According to (i) fermentation method, after adding 0.1M sodium hydroxide to the broth, use ETNA 10A membrane (10K Dalton cut-off) for ultrafiltration. After water is used for infiltration and filtration -54- This paper scale is used in the Chinese National Standard (CNS) A4 specification (210X297 public shame) (please read the precautions on the back before filling this page) fc.A_ 、? Τ Central Ministry of Economic Affairs Standards—Printed by the Industrial and Consumer Cooperatives ^ 2164 4 A7 B7 Printed and printed by the Employees ’Cooperative of the Central Standards Bureau of the Ministry of Economic Affairs V. Description of the invention (52) 'The exudate is a clear solution. After adjusting the pH to 5.2 with concentrated sulfuric acid, the exudate was loaded on a XAD16 resin column at a loading rate of 2 column volumes / hour, and finally 32 grams of 4, -demethyl sodarin was loaded per liter of resin. This column was washed with 0.1% volume / volume phosphoric acid, and then with 20% volume / volume acetonitrile / water (each with 10 column volumes) at a rate of 2 column volumes / hour. The column was washed off with 65% acetonitrile / water, and the washing off rate was 2 column volumes / hour. Discard the 0.75 column volume that flowed out first, and collect 85% of the loaded 4. · demethylsodarin from the eluate of 1.6 column volume later. This large amount of washed material was treated with 20% weight / volume DE52 cellulose with stirring for 5 minutes, and then taken out and filtered. An aliquot of the eluate treated with DE52 was concentrated using a rotary evaporator to 62% of the original volume (43% acetonitrile). The concentrated eluate was kept at 4 for 15 hours to crystallize, and the collected solid was filtered with a glass porous filter. The crystals were washed with 30% volume / volume acetonitrile / water of 4 cake volume and dried at 30 ° C. The title compound (94 g) collected from the concentrated eluate was a light gray solid. Preparation of 5 sieving microorganisms capable of demethylating sodarin at the 4 'position. Microorganisms capable of demethylating sodarin at the 4 position can be obtained at 28. (: (Bacteria) or 25 ° C (strains) grown in a 50-mL Erlenmeyer flask with a volume of 10 mL of SB1 (bacteria) or FBI (strains). This flask was shaken at 250 rpm. 2 Days later, add sodarin to a final concentration of 0.5 mg / ml (taken from a 200 mg / ml stock solution in 80% ethanol), and incubate the flask for another 3 days. A 500 μl sample is taken from the entire culture Mix with 500 μl of 80% acetonitrile / 2% trifluoroacetic acid in an Eppendorf tube, and allow it to be extracted at room temperature for 30 minutes -55 I &quot; -------— —.— I (Please read the notes on the back before filling this page)

'1T 3^1β44 Α7 Β7五、發明説明（53) 。由微離心器離心過的樣品所得的萃取漂浮物用等度HPLC 鑑定4 '-脱甲基索達林。用3 5 %乙腈於水内的移動相洗離 4'-脱甲基索達林3.3 5分鐘，流速2毫升/分鐘，使用 Spherisorb C6柱（5微米，15公分X4.6毫米）。以此法可證 實下述微生物爲索達林脱曱基者： 經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印袋 纏繞鏈霉菌 ATCC 31963 Streptomyces avermitilis ATCC 31272 畜群鏈霉菌 NRRL 3176 抗生錢霉菌 ATCC 31771 龜裂鏈霉菌 ATCC 23955 普拉特鏈霉菌 ATCC 29778 馬書鏈霉菌 ATCC 23934 泛溫鏈霉菌 ATCC 14975 東方諾卡氏菌 ATCC 43491 美麗刺孢小克銀漢霉 ATCC 36112 SB1培養基 克/公升 Arkasoy 25 酵母萃取物 5 kh2po4 5 葡萄糖 20 蒸餾水 pH 7 (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) -56- 本紙張尺度適用中國國家標準（CNS ) A4规格（210X297公釐） 克/公升 30 10 5 5 20 ^^1644 ΑΊ __2_Β7 五、發明説明（54) FBI培養基 大豆'1T 3 ^ 1β44 Α7 Β7 V. Description of the invention (53). The extracted float obtained from the sample centrifuged by the microcentrifuge was identified by isocratic HPLC using 4'-demethylsodarin. The mobile phase of 35% acetonitrile in water was used to wash away 4'-demethyl sodarin for 3.3 5 minutes at a flow rate of 2 ml / min using a Spherisorb C6 column (5 microns, 15 cm X 4.6 mm). Arkasoy 酵母萃取物 k2hpo4 葡萄糖 蒸餘水 pH 5.5 製備6 以索達林生物轉化製備41-脱甲基索这林 將0·3毫升纏繞鏈霉菌ATCC 3 1963孢子懸浮液（丨5 %的容 積/容積甘油内的溶液，存於-20 °C的）接種於250毫升 Erlenmeyer燒瓶内的30毫升SB1培養基内，形成種培養物 ，此培養物於28 °C培養’並於迴轉搖動器上以250轉/分 鐘搖動。4天後，用0.5毫升此培養物接種於250毫升燒瓶内 的35毫升SB1，於28°C，250轉/分鐘生長48小時。於此 階段，將培養物整分爲10毫升的量加入Erlenmeyer燒瓶内 ，燒瓶内加5毫克索達林（取自200毫克/毫升乙醇内的存儲 溶液）。再繼續培養3天。於整個肉湯（14毫升）内加80%容 積/容積的乙腈於水内的溶液（1 4毫升），此混合物存放於 室溫下，不時搖動。30分鐘後，離心取出細胞。蒸發除去 乙腈’以正鱗酸將此水溶液pH調整至2.5。將此溶液通過 含有Amberlite XAD-16樹脂的柱（床容積5毫升）。吸附物相 -57- 本紙張尺度逍用中國國家標準（CNS ) A4规格（210X297公釐） ~ (請先閲讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) 訂 經濟部中央標準局貝工消費合作社印製 A7 32l644 B7 五、發明説明（55 ) (請先Μ讀背面之注意事項再填寫本頁) 繼用水（10毫升），10 %容積/容積乙腈於水内的溶液（2〇 毫升），30 %容積/容積乙腈於水内的溶液（20毫升）及9〇 % 容積/容積乙腈於水内的溶液（1〇毫升）洗。各部分用HPLC 鑑測：於50 %容積/容積乙腈於水内的洗離物中有4'-脱甲 基索達林。將含4'-脱甲基索達林的部分於室溫眞空蒸發至 乾，殘餘物再溶於35 %容積/容積乙腈於水内的溶液（15毫 升）。以製備用HPLC純化4’-脱甲基索達林。 柱 Spherisorb 5微米C 6 2 5公分X 2.5公分 流速 25毫升/分鐘 測定 UV，210納米 流動相 用350毫升乙腈用0.05M的磷酸氫銨水溶液加至 1000毫升。pH以正磷酸調整至2.5 注射容積4 · 5毫升 經濟部中央標準局員工消費合作社印製 10分鐘後以此條件洗離4'-脱曱基索達林。集中四次HPLC 的流液’用水作1 : 1稀釋，然後唧回二氧化矽上（在以水洗 並以水在平衡後）。吸附物用水（200毫升）洗，吸附的產物 用95%容積/容積乙腈於水内的溶液（200毫升）洗離。將乙 腈/水洗離物蒸發除去有基溶劑，將水溶液;東乾，製得4，_ 脱甲基索達林（1.5毫克），爲白色粉。 ^ ('H, CDC13); After 4 days, 0.5 ml of this culture was used to inoculate 35 ml of SB1 in a 250 ml flask and grown at 28 ° C, 250 rpm for 48 hours. At this stage, the culture was divided into 10 ml into Erlenmeyer flask, and 5 mg of sodarin (from the storage solution in 200 mg / ml of ethanol) was added to the flask. Continue to cultivate for another 3 days. Add 80% volume / volume of acetonitrile in water (14 ml) to the entire broth (14 ml). Store this mixture at room temperature with shaking from time to time. After 30 minutes, the cells were removed by centrifugation. The acetonitrile was removed by evaporation, and the pH of the aqueous solution was adjusted to 2.5 with n-scalic acid. This solution was passed through a column containing Amberlite XAD-16 resin (bed volume 5 ml). Description of the invention (55) (please read the precautions on the back and then fill in this page) Follow up with water (10ml), 10% volume / volume solution of acetonitrile in water (20ml), 30% Wash the volume / volume acetonitrile solution in water (20 ml) and 90% volume / volume acetonitrile solution in water (10 ml). Each part was identified by HPLC: there was 4'-demethylsodarin in the eluate of 50% volume / volume acetonitrile in water. The portion containing 4'-demethyl sodarin was evaporated to dryness at room temperature, and the residue was redissolved in a 35% volume / volume solution of acetonitrile in water (15 mL). 4'-Demethyl sodarin was purified by preparative HPLC.
